description: 327 101st St #1A, Brooklyn, NY is a 3 bed, 3 bath, 1302 sq ft home in foreclosure. Sign in to Trulia to receive all foreclosure information.
broad-description:
Very Large Duplex Unit with 1st floor featuring a Finished Recreational Room, an Entertainment Room and a Half Bathroom. Second Level Features 2 Bedrooms, 2 Full Bathrooms, a Living Room/Dining Room and an Outdoor Space. There is Verrazano Bridge views.
